assignments.name: message
assignments.value: This workflow documents the Airtable schema. Please create the tables manually in Airtable following the schema below.

assignments.name: fields
assignments.value: videoId (Single line text - Primary), title (Single line text), description (Long text), tags (Single line text), publishedAt (Date), thumbnailUrl (URL), viewCount (Number), duration (Single line text), lastSharedAt (Date), shareCount (Number - Default: 0), searchableText (Long text)

assignments.name: fields
assignments.value: trendId (Single line text - Primary), keyword (Single line text), source (Single select: google/reddit/twitter), category (Single select: dolls/figures/lego/boardgames/general), detectedAt (Date), trafficVolume (Single line text), relatedQueries (Long text), processed (Checkbox), matchedVideoId (Link to Videos)

assignments.name: fields
assignments.value: postId (Single line text - Primary), videoId (Link to Videos), trendId (Link to Trends), postText (Long text), postedAt (Date), likes (Number - Default: 0), retweets (Number - Default: 0)

parameters.content:
## Airtable Schema Setup

This workflow documents the required Airtable schema for the Trend Reshare System.

### Setup Instructions

1. Go to https://airtable.com and create a new base called **Trend Reshare System**

2. Create **3 tables** with the field configurations shown in the output nodes:
   - **Videos** - Stores your YouTube channel videos
   - **Trends** - Stores detected trends from Google
   - **Posts** - Records X posts made by the system

3. For **Single select** fields, add these options:
   - **source**: google, reddit, twitter
   - **category**: dolls, figures, lego, boardgames, general

4. For **Link** fields:
   - **matchedVideoId** links to Videos table
   - **videoId** (in Posts) links to Videos table
   - **trendId** (in Posts) links to Trends table

5. Set **default values**:
   - shareCount: 0
   - likes: 0
   - retweets: 0

### After Setup

1. Copy your **Base ID** from the Airtable URL (starts with 'app')
2. Generate an **API Key** at https://airtable.com/account
3. Add these to n8n credentials

## Videos Table
Stores YouTube channel video metadata for matching against trends.

## Trends Table
Stores detected trends from Google Trends RSS feed.

## Posts Table
Records all X posts made by the system for tracking and analytics.
